directions.step:
DRAIN pineapple, reserving juice, Add cold water to juice to measure 1 cup
STIR boiling water into gelatin in large bowl 2 minutes or until until completely dissolved. Stir in measured liquid. Refrigerate about 1 1 1/4 hours until slightly thickened. STIR in whipped topping with wire whisk until smooth. Refrigerate 10 minutes or until mixture will mound. Stir in pineapple, oranges, marshmallows and coconut. Spoon into 6 cup mold.
REFRIGERATE 4 hours or until firm. Unmold.
Recipe by: Kay Hitchcock
Posted to TNT Recipes Digest, Vol 01, Nr 925 by "Kay L. Hitchcock" <HITCHCOC_K@popmail.firn.edu> on Jan 09, 1998
